PCRE_INFO(3)                                                      PCRE_INFO(3)



NAME
       PCRE - Perl-compatible regular expressions

SYNOPSIS

       #include <pcre.h>

       int   pcre_info(const   pcre  *code,  int  *optptr,  int
       *firstcharptr);

DESCRIPTION

       This  function  is  obsolete.  You   should   be   using
       pcre_fullinfo() instead.

       There  is  a complete description of the PCRE native API
       in the pcreapi page and a description of the  POSIX  API
       in the pcreposix page.



                                                                  PCRE_INFO(3)
